name: Pic Sell
author: Benjamin CESTRE

sections.description: With Pic Sell, create your private galleries with a password and offer your customers, friends, families the possibility of buying media (images, videos) according to previously configured offer packs. Specially designed for photographers or artists selling art galleries. This extension embeds the payment by Paypal easily configurable with an intuitive interface.
sections.installation:
1. Upload and activate the plugin (or install it through the WP admin console)
  2. That’s it, it is ready to use!
